channel.title: Lardainscape 508
channel.description:
Hello there people of Moparscape. I am lardain and have been around on moparscape since 2008 -2009. I never released anything before and thought it was about time to give something to the community. Before I start with this topic I wanna thank Davidi2 for his awesome 508 source. I learned allot from his source. I hope more people will start using 508`s again as they are fun, they might be buggy but they are fun to play!
I`ll start out with the credits: Davidi2: His source Davidscape v 7.0 (unknown user): For his 508 client. Me (lardain) Coding on this source.
This server came with allot of content, here is the original thread: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=410169.0
What I did:
-Rewrote herblore skill. Now you can actually make pots! -Added vesta, statius, zuriels, donator cape, all spiritshields, etc. -Fixed the agilty cource as it was bugged and you where not able to do it. -Made the server yell when reaching a 100 in a skill. -Made a donator rank + Donator shop + Revs for donators. you can get donator from the bauble. -Added some drops to a few npc`s. -Added kbd with its drops. Drops dragon claws to. -Added corp with spirit shield drops and a random amount of cash. -Added clue scroll with random rewards. -New home with spread shops. -Started on making a new quest. -I can`t think of much more I did, as I redid this source for like 5 times.
Here are some pictures: (note: only the content I put in this server is in the pictures) If you wanna see what the source comes with you should go to davids topic. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=410169.0
[spoiler=pictures] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K7NDAua.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/64aqXEV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lEzEaSD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ljd5zlz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tt62b0X.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kD0KaFI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jTzSCK8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oLRR96W.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YOdVIvW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/phiI3Ui.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7NfJsWl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/p1DeQkg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TaYAPdR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wXcNKDF.png[/img] [/spoiler]
Download link: Client + Source: http://uppit.com/97tznbdvv5rf/lardainscape.rar https://www.mediafire.com/?zp919za9177m866
Ones again, Thanks alot david for making this source, I learned hell alot of it. loved to play this server when you hosted it.
If you have questions or need help feel free to ask. Feel free to add me on skype: lardain
Edit: For those who wonder if an hd client works, yes it does work. But the customs would be gone, also the spirit beast is set back to non attackable (no attack option) click the spoiler for an picture. [spoiler= hd client] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9bwF8QB.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

Sorry williams, this is old new. It had been detected in the client before. I cant tell ofcourse it is safe. Because since when can the releaser say it is. But it got confirmed by some respected people on mopar that it is safe to use. And as i said before. If you dont trust it just get another 508 client and import the custom items in there if you know how yo. I am sorry that it showed up as a virus though. I never had that… Probally because i never used a virus scanner. Haha. But as i said, it should not be harmfull. Still thankyou if you are using this base. I would like to see more 508`s come out.

Read full topic

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

Sorry for all the people who would like to see a v2. I am willing to do it. But there are some things what will make this along time.
I work 7 days a week now, apart from that my computer crashed so I am working for a new one now. And in my spare time I had me and a friend of mine started to make a multiplayer fps game from scratch in unity. But as I said I will do it. But I can`t say when i can make it. Sorry!

Read full topic

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

Just fixed it:

	public void sendPlayerCount() {
		sendTab(resizableScreen ? 1 : 11, 209);
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 2, 
						//"There is currently "+World.getPlayers().size()+						
						"Enjoy your time on "+Settings.SERVER_NAME+
						"!");		
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 3,  "");
		player.getPackets().sendHideIComponent(209, 4, true);
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 5, "");				
	}

Thanks for the help though

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

Try to put some text in tring it self. like " " or just add a . in it. Sorry but i never used the interfaces on 718s tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

lardain:

If I`m right that part is child 4. Try to put something in the string.

Here’s my method:

	public void sendPlayerCount() {
		sendTab(resizableScreen ? 1 : 11, 209);
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 2, 
						//"There is currently "+World.getPlayers().size()+						
						"Enjoy your time on "+Settings.SERVER_NAME+
						"!");		
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 3,  "");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 4,  "");
		player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(209, 5, "");				
	}

Still the same as before

Read full topic

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

[quote=“lardain, post:29, topic:541609”]If you get that add the other childs to.
Like:

p.frames.setString(p, "<col=ff000>LardainScape", 209, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 4); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 5);

So the other strings will be empty.[/quote]

Ah yeah I forgot I was working on my 718, think there’s some embedded config difference because I set the other childIds to just “” and it still shows it lol

Anyway it’s okay I guess

Read full topic

item.title: Lardainscape 508
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

If you get that add the other childs to.
Like:

p.frames.setString(p, "<col=ff000>LardainScape", 209, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 4); p.frames.setString(p, "", 209, 5);

So the other strings will be empty.

Read full topic
